com.github.sbugat.rundeckmonitor

Class RundeckMonitorTrayIcon

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.sbugat.rundeckmonitor.RundeckMonitorTrayIcon
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RundeckMonitorAWTTrayIcon, RundeckMonitorSwingTrayIcon

    public abstract class RundeckMonitorTrayIcon
extends Object
    Tray icon common class with no-AWT/Swing components.
    Author:
    Sylvain Bugat
